name: Dice Knight (Charred Axolotl)
description:
ControlsMOVEWASD or Arrow Keys
ATTACKZ

A hectic work schedule and a short time frame bring you Dice Knight for the GMTK game jam.

The D6 in the upper left corner is how much damage you'll do if you attack on that turn. It's completely randomized, though you can  see your next two rolls underneath it.

Use the next rolls to strategize how you'll move and take out the enemies in your path. They all have different movement patterns and signify when they're about to attack in different ways, so be sure to pay attention!
